task.title: Creating a new meeting
task.shortdesc: You can set options for instant meetings and logging on the add-in Settings window.

step.cmd: Click the Sametime add-in logo and select Add Meeting.
Click meetings menu ( ) and select Settings..
step.info:
There are two settings that you can turn on and off.
Use personal room for Instant room When enabled and you create an instant meeting, your personal meeting is used. Otherwise, a new meeting is created with a new name.
Enable debug logging Turn logging on and off. When logging is turned on, the following options are available.
Click Clear to remove current content from the log.
Click Copy to clipboard to copy the current log contents so that you can paste it into a file.

step.cmd: Click the return icon or close icon when you are finished.
